RelatedSentence: Funds under management at IFG Corporate Pensions grew to €979 m at the end of April , compared with €955 m at the end of last December on the back of 17 new client wins so far this year .

RelatedSentence: New business momentum has been sustained in our core businesses with James Hay Partnership , Saunderson House and IFG Ireland continuing to win new clients and assets , it said in a statement .
